Class ec.e.inspect.VectorInspector 

java.lang.Object
   |
   +----ec.e.inspect.Inspector
           |
           +----ec.e.inspect.VectorInspector
public class VectorInspector
extends Inspector
For java.lang.Vector we create a specialized subclass of Inspector. For information about the different methods, see the descriptions in its superclass, ec.inspect.Inspector

VectorInspector(Vector, String)

get(int, Object)
Return the value of a field, given a field index and an object to inspect.
getAssignedSignature(Object, int)
Return the signature of the actually assigned data in a field given a field index and an inspected object.
getDeclaredSignature(int)
Return the declared signature of a field given a field index.
getName(int)
Return the variable name of a field given an index
getSize(Object)
Return the number of fields in this inspector
isEditable(int)
Tells whether a field with a given index is editable or not
isInspectable(int)
Tells whether a field with a given index is editable
set(int, Object, Object)
set the value of a field, given a field index, an object to inspect, and a new value.
